name: OCKCartesianChartView
desc: A chart view that contains a graph, a legend, and an axis.

items.name: init(type: OCKCartesianGraphView.PlotType)
items.desc: Creates a chart with a specified type of bar, plot, or scatter.

items.name: var delegate: OCKChartViewDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles interactions with the chart view.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: Vertical stack view that contains the chart content.

items.name: let graphView: OCKCartesianGraphView
items.desc: A view that shows graph content and axis markers.

items.name: let headerView: OCKHeaderView
items.desc: A customizable header view, shown at the top of the chart view.
